titles.title: Creating Manufacturing Jobs and Promoting Fair Trade Act
To create jobs and promote fair trade by increasing duties on certain foreign goods imported into the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/14/2013--Introduced. Creating Manufacturing Jobs and Promoting Fair Trade Act - Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to increase the duty on polyurethane sponges. Prescribes requirements for the duty treatment of steel wool cleaning pads.
